summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 35th Avenue Northwest, from West 60th Street to the alley north thereof; and a certain alley; by paving the same; property owners' petition, being City Comptroller's File No. 198225 all in accordance with the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
